text: “(Iwo) adati: “Ngati waba, m’bale wakenso adabapo kale.” (Uku kudali kumunamizira Yûsuf bodza pomwe iwo sankadziwa kuti yemwe akuyankhula nayeyo ndiye Yûsuf). Koma Yûsuf adabisa (mawu awa) mu mtima mwake, (chifukwa chowamvera chisoni) ndipo sadawaululire. Adati: “Inu muli ndi chikhalidwe choipa ndipo Allah akudziwa zomwe mukunena!”
